message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can work things out from there.
Your offer is tempting, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile. How about a 55/45 split in your favor?
I appreciate the negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more.  Let's try a 58/42 split this time.  This will ensure we both get a reasonable share.
Alice, we're getting close. I appreciate the compromise. How about we meet in the middle at a 53/47 split? This feels fair considering the time pressure.
